hero.title: Search, Choose, Book, Enjoy
hero.description: Evento has created a platform that offers a package of integrated services that give it technical solutions and professionally manage various events, providing them with a service of booking and selling them online, in addition to the feature of browsing upcoming events, various recreational activities and cultural gatherings.

servicesHome.title: Our services have no limits in registration and ticket sale
servicesHome.des1: To manage all kinds of events and conferences in an easy and simple way
servicesHome.des2: To control all event data and details such as ticket fees and discount coupons
servicesHome.des3: To manage all kinds of events and conferences in an easy and simple way
